definition: grass radical 草字頭兒|草字头儿[cao3 zi4 tou2 r5]
branches and tendrils/fig. overcomplicated or digressive
lit. abandoned by men and choked with weeds/desolate (idiom)
to spread throughout the entire country

sentences.english: But it had a nine million dollar surplus in cranberries.
sentences.chinese: 但却有九百万美元的蔓越橘的剩余。

sentences.english: Stranded wonderful spread tongue, is like a song you dance the last empress dowager.
sentences.chinese: 舌间搁浅的妙蔓，是想为你舞一曲最后倾国倾城。

sentences.english: Add the cereal and cranberries. Stir. Set aside.
sentences.chinese: 加入麦片和蔓越莓一起搅拌。

sentences.english: Then we came to a tavern with vine-leaves over the lintel.
sentences.chinese: 我们来到一家酒馆，门楣上爬满籐蔓。

sentences.english: If I know what love is, it is for of you.
sentences.chinese: 爱是长在我们心里的籐蔓。

sentences.english: Love is a vine namely grows into our centers.
sentences.chinese: 爱是长在我们心里的籐蔓。

sentences.english: Many people describe the goji berry plant as a mix between a grape vine, and a tomato creeper.
sentences.chinese: 很多人形容评为浆果厂作为组合之间，葡萄，番茄蔓。

sentences.english: But it had a 9 million dollar surplus in cranberries .
sentences.chinese: 不过在蔓越橘上则有九百万美元的盈余。

sentences.english: Add the cereal and cranberries. Stir.
sentences.chinese: 加入麦片和蔓越莓一起搅拌。

sentences.english: Anthocyanins 1 and 2 are not found in blueberries or cranberries.
sentences.chinese: 花色苷1和2都没有出现在蓝莓或蔓越梅。

sentences.english: Sue could see an old ivy vine climbing halfway up the brick wall.
sentences.chinese: 苏可以看到一株老常春藤蔓爬到砖墙的一半高。

sentences.english: Before, he had been a servant to Dr Manette.
sentences.chinese: 从前他在蔓奈特家当过佣人。

sentences.english: Found in blueberries and cranberries, anthocyanins have been shown to aid memory.
sentences.chinese: 已经指出蓝莓和蔓越橘中所含的花青素可以帮助记忆。

sentences.english: She told him about Johnsy and the leaves on the ivy vine.
sentences.chinese: 她把有关蔷希及常春藤蔓的叶子的事情告诉了他。

sentences.english: Stranded wonderful spread between the tongue, is like a song you dance the last empress dowager.
sentences.chinese: 舌间搁浅的妙蔓，是想为你舞一曲最后倾国倾城。
